title: Avengers' Brie Larson's face as she's caught in middle of proposal
text:
Brie is so gosh darn wholesome (Picture: Rex Features)

You may never see someone as shocked as Brie Larson when the Avengers star was caught in the middle of a proposal over the weekend.

The Captain Marvel star was holding fort at ACE Comic Con when during a meet and greet one of her fans decided to pop the question to his partner.

In a scene that is like a photo booth on steroids, in a series of images John Chambrone can be seen whipping out an engagement band and getting down on bended knee.

We don’t know who to look at first – is it the guy proposing, the guy being proposed to, hands over mouth, or Brie Larson who is just in complete shock?

With her mouth agape, 30-year-old Brie still has her arms wrapped around the two fans as the scene moves on, only moving out of the middle of the pair when they kiss and seal the deal.

Y’all I was present for a proposal and I am CHANGED. Much love to the happy couple!!!! https://t.co/UMc4WofFja — Brie Larson (@brielarson) October 13, 2019

Poking around the corner of the recently-affianced, Brie’s face is still a thing of wonder.

Sharing the magical moment to Twitter, she wrote: ‘Y’all I was present for a proposal and I am CHANGED.’

Sharing her well wishes, she added: ‘Much love to the happy couple!!!!’

Obviously while we’re just so happy for the couple, our lives have been made by Brie’s timeless reaction.

Taking to Facebook to share his delight at the moment, John wrote: ‘So, most of you may know that I was popping the question today to my beloved Richard Owen and it could not have gone better!

‘Brie Larson was amazing! He said yes and we both put the ring on his finger.

‘As we were walking away, Richard said he saw her tear up a bit.’

He continued: ‘We are both so happy that we have been crying on and off all night. I never in my life thought I would be this much in love with anyone, let alone want to marry them, but he truly is an amazing guy who shows me daily how much he loves me and I am crazy about him too.

‘They took 4 pictures to give us so here you go! Thanks to Brie Larson and Ace Comic Con for bringing her to Chicago and allowing me to include her in this, making it the most epic moment of my life!’

And, frankly, a pretty wholesome and epic moment in our life, too.
